nodes.text: A model of blaster carbine was utilized by members of Mandalorian Guard as well as the radical Mandalorian splinter-group known as Death Watch during the Clone Wars. Similar in appearance to the smaller WESTAR-35 blaster pistol, the blaster carbine was blocky and squarish in design. It was mainly light grey with additional darker grey pieces and was known to fire yellow, blue or red blaster bolts, seeming dependent on the political allegiance of the user.
This blaster carbine appears multiple times throughout the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series, being first seen in "The Mandalore Plot".
